description: The former chef turned writer and TV host exposed the underbelly of restaurant culture and took viewers on far-flung culinary adventures with biting wit and a worldly outlook.
title: Rebel in the Kitchen: Remembering Anthony Bourdain
title_page: Rebel in the Kitchen: Remembering Anthony Bourdain - Video - NYTimes.com
text: The former chef turned writer and TV host exposed the underbelly of restaurant culture and took viewers on far-flung culinary adventures with biting wit and a worldly outlook.
